testsuite.name: users.UsersLoginNameFieldTest
testsuite.system-out: Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersLoginNamePlaceholderText Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Login Name field Placeholder text in the Users Add screen" Login Name* text is displayed in the Login Name placeholder TC_usersLoginNamePlaceholderText Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersLoginNameEmpty Testcase execution Started "This method verifies error message for the empty Login Name in the Users Add screen" Performed click action on Users screen Login Name field Entered text "" in the Users screen Login Name field Required error message is displayed TC_usersLoginNameEmpty Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersLoginNamenameAlphanumeric Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Login Name field for the Alphabetic characters" Performed click action on Users screen Login Name field Entered text "AORL" in the Users screen Login Name field Alphanumeric characters are allowed in the Login Name text field TC_usersLoginNamenameAlphanumeric Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersLoginNameSpace Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Login Name field by entering Spaces" Entered space in the Users screen Login Name text field Space is not allowed error message is displayed TC_usersLoginNameSpace Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersLoginNameMaximumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Login Name field for the maximum character length" Performed click action on Users screen Login Name field Entered text "DLvVTVGvnjFlJtNy" in the Users screen Login Name field Must be less than 16 characters error message is displayed TC_usersLoginNameMaximumLength Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersLoginNameMinimumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Login Name field for the minimum character length" Performed click action on Users screen Login Name field Entered text "QGi" in the Users screen Login Name field Must be greater than 3 characters error message is displayed TC_usersLoginNameMinimumLength Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersLoginNameSpecialChar Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Login Name field for the Special characters" Performed click action on Users screen Login Name field Entered text "&/$)." in the Users screen Login Name field Special characters are allowed in the Login Name text field TC_usersLoginNameSpecialChar Testcase execution Completed
